name: A Wedding Between Land and Sea
description:
DESCRIPTION
A UNIQUE PLACE
In an exceptional natural setting, we offer a vast area dedicated to your events.
The beach is easily walkable on foot for stunning photos and its wooded park make it the ideal place for an unforgettable venue.
YOUR EVENT
Our team will be here to help every step of the way. Our experience and our network of approved professionals will best contribute to bringing your event to the hoped-for success.
THE PERFECT PLACE FOR YOUR RECEPTIONS
For the organization of receptions, weddings or gala evenings, our packages adapt to your desires.
From total autonomy to the turnkey version, we do our best to adapt your desires to your budget.
Located in the heart of the Gulf of Morbihan, 400 m from the beach, we offer you the sea and the countryside, in a rural setting surrounded by meadows, and coastal paths with a thousand landscapes, you will feel at home.
OUR SPACES
Reception room
The 155m2 reception room overlooks the garden, it easily accommodates 120 or more guests. Adjoining, equipped with professional equipment, the 50m2 kitchen allows your caterer to serve you serenely.
A second room of 120m2, with oak parquet, stage, opens onto a stone walled terrace is at your disposal for your cocktail party.
Exterior
5000m2 of garden dedicated to your event. You will be able to offer you relaxation on our large green spaces or the ceremony in the shade of cypresses, oaks and poplars over 50 years old.
The rooms
Our onsite accommodation includes two cosy double bedrooms, an 8-person cabin dormitory and a 15-bed dormitory. That is to say 27 beds in total. We also offer the possibility of pitching tents in areas of the garden.
In order to meet your requirements, we offer different packages with different durations and levels of services. Simple rental, accommodation services, or turnkey. We always try to create with you the moment closest to your requirements, however personal they may be.
PARTY AIR - from 3200 €
The site is reserved for your event from Friday 5 p.m. to Sunday 5 p.m.
Garden, main room of 155 m2 and its adjoining professional kitchen .
Tables and chairs provided for up to 120 guests .
Housekeeping included.
The possibility of reserving our rooms and dormitories.
The ideal formula for a family reunion in a beautiful space.
decorative dream catcher
wedding meal
DREAM DAY
€ 4,100
The site is reserved for you for your event from Friday noon to Sunday 7 pm.
The whole site. 5000m2 garden, the main room, professional kitchen.
This formula includes the provision of the large La Cantine room with tables and chairs, crockery for the whole weekend.
Housekeeping included.
12 beds in rooms and dormitories. The possibility of reserving an additional dormitory.
wedding rings
wedding car
THE BIG GAME
€ 4,900
The site is reserved for you for your event from Friday noon to Monday noon.
The whole site. Garden, two rooms, professional kitchen, beds.
Possibility of installing structures before the event.
This formula includes the provision of the large La Cantine room with tables and chairs, crockery for the whole weekend. Hall Class of 120m2 oak floors, glass, overlooking a terrace rounded.
Games of taverns.
Housekeeping included.
27 beds in rooms and dormitories available for 3 nights.
Take full advantage of a weekend, for you and your guests, long preparation time, rooms and dormitories ready, and the possibility of leaving at your own pace.
These formulas are flexible in terms of duration and services, please do not hesitate to contact us.
